item.title: China Locks 34,000 Guests Inside DISNEYLAND for Covid Tests...
item.description:
www.msn.com

People in Hazmat suits streamed in through the gates, preparing to test everyone for Covid-19 before they could leave for the day.

item.title: DEMS HALLOWEEN SPOOKED: FEAR VIRGINIA DISASTER...
item.description:
apnews.com
RICHMOND, Va. (AP) — For four years, nothing rallied Democrats like the push to get Donald Trump out of office. Now, they're not sure what to do without him. Democrats in Virginia are scrambling to stave off disaster in the state's governor's race — the most competitive major election since Trump left the White House.
